title: Drawing, "Drawing. Studies.  Landscapes near Guaranda, Ecuador", June 4, 1857
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on greenish paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with P's at various locations and at lower right and left:  Near Guaranda June 4th 57
description: Horizontal view of high mountains in the distance across foothills.  A hill is shown in the foreground with a road and a woman walking.  Cactus plants are visible at left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing. Studies.  Landscapes near Guaranda, Ecuador", June 4, 1857.
June 4, 1857. Graphite, brush and white gouache on greenish paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-719-a.
